snippet: Welcome to what promises to be a high-stakes brawl to win a casino license in the Catskills if Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s plan to expand gambling in New York is approved by voters next week.
abstract: Developers are laying out plans to convert abandoned Catskills resorts into casinos in what promises to be a high-stakes battle to win one, or two, possible casino licenses if Gov Andrew M Cuomo's plan to expand gambling in New York State is approved by voters; area has attracted both the most numerous and most ambitious proposals.
lead_paragraph: Welcome to what promises to be a high-stakes brawl to win a casino license in the Catskills if Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s plan to expand gambling in New York is approved by voters next week.

headline.main: Developers Vie to Build New Casinos in Catskills
headline.print_headline: Developers Vie for Casinos in Catskills
